attributes.action: guarentee that Britain will not be "sharing" its carriers with France?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This sort of agreement will depend on both countries agreeing on lending a carrier to the other. In the Falklands war, the French government supplied exocet missiles when Britain was already at war. How can Britain take that risk again especially with a carrier? If Britain can spend £10 billion plus on the Olympics it should be able to spend less than half that on dedicated carriers
